alert.note: Alert for McPherson (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Ice Storm Warning issued December 25 at 1:36PM MST until December 26 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...ICE STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Significant icing. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches and ice accumulations of three tenths to one half of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...McPherson County. * WHEN...Until 6 PM CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are likely due to the ice. Travel could be nearly impossible. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Strong winds could cause tree damage.
info.instruction: Travel is strongly discouraged. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
